ovdesc.p: This Standard Field Type application used to define a standard set of fields to extract some standard information like interest and charge.
Below standard set of fields would be defined for INTEREST in AA.STANDARD.FIELD.TYPE which will make-up interest information, like
a. Whether interest rate is defined or not
b. Type of interest, Fixed or Periodic or Floating
c. Resolved interest rate (for key) or fixed interest rate
d. Preferential rate for the customer
e. Reset date for periodic or floating type interest
Similarly below standard set of fields would be defined for CHARGE in AA.STANDARD.FIELD.TYPE which will make-up the charge information, like,
a. Whether charge is defined or not
b. Type of charge, Calculated or Fixed
c. Charge rate in case of calculated
e. Preferential pricing amount for the customer
These special data is only applicable for INTEREST and CHARGE properties.

desc.p: It accepts YES or NO values. This field decides that FULL.DESCRIPTION of the property condition to be displayed in enquiry screen or not. If it set as YES then FULL.DESCRIPTION defined in property condition will displayed in enquiry screen. If it set as NO then FULL.DESCRIPTION in property condition will not display in enquiry screen.
Standard multi-language description type field to update description for the record.
User can give their own description to the FIELD.NAME to display in enquiry screen. It is multi language field.
Defines the name of the field that can be used to extracted field values from property condition. It is multi value field associated with FIELD.DESCRIPTION.
List of available options are

DEFINED – This option will be applicable for bother Interest and charge properties. It describes whether interest or charge is defined in product or not. If defined then field value will be displayed as Yes. Otherwise Null.

TYPE - This option will be applicable for bother Interest and charge properties. It describes the type of the interest (Fixed, Periodic or Floating) for interest property and type of charge (Fixed or Calculated) for interest property.
Below list of options applicable for interest property.
INTEREST.RATE -. It describes the interest rate of the product.
PRICING.INT.RATE - It describes the preferential rate for the customer.
DISCOUNT.INT.RATE - It describes the how much discount percentage has given to preferential customer.
RATE.RESET.DATE - It describes the reset date for periodic and floating type interests.
Below list of option applicable for Charge property
CHARGE.AMOUNT - It describes the charge amount for given charge property. It will be fixed charge amount.
PRICING.AMOUNT - It describes the preferential charge amount for the customer.
DISCOUNT.AMOUNT - It describes the how munch charge amount has given discount to preferential customer.
CHARGE.RATE – it describes the percentage of charge collected for charge property. It will be applicable for calculated charge types.
PRICING.CHG.RATE - it describes the preferential charge rate for the customer.
DISCOUNT.CHG.RATE – it describes the how much percentage has given discount to the preferential customer.
Standard full description field where a detailed notes on the purpose of the record could be updated.
